import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import StepIndicator from "../../StepIndicator/Steps"; // import ContactPage from "../ContactUs/ContactPage"; // Uncomment if needed // import Video from "./video/Video"; // Uncomment if you need this component function Index() { const [error, setError] = useState(""); const [jobsData, setJobs] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { const fetchJobs = async () => { try { const api = "http://localhost:2000/api/jobls/"; const response = await fetch(api); if (!response.ok) { throw new Error("Network response was not ok"); } const data = await response.json(); setJobs(data.Jobs[0]); // Store all jobs } catch (e) { setError(e.message); console.error(e.message); } }; fetchJobs(); }, []); return ( <>

Find our products and services

Branding news

Create an account
Sign in

Find Your Dream Job

Latest Job Listings

{error ? (
{error}
) : jobsData && jobsData.length > 0 ? ( jobsData.map((item, index) => (

{item.JOB_TITLE}

Company: {item.COMPANY}

Location: {item.LOCATION}

Salary: {item.SALARY}

Description: {item.DESCRIPTION}

Apply Now
)) ) : (

There are no jobs available

{/*
)}
{/* */} ); } export default Index;
